Content: 🔥   ⭐ HOP CLAN IS RECRUITING ⭐    🔥NLNLWe are clan HOP (Hope Of People). We are a clan that play Fortnite_ we have just started so we are a bit small on numbers but if you join and help us grow we can become a big and a really good clan and do Scrims_ Tournaments etc.NLNL                                                       🔥    ⭐ HOW TO JOIN ⭐    🔥NLNLTo join you have to have a mic and at least 11 years old. You can be on any platform_ any server and you can join. You will be tested and then put into a team.NLNL                                                    🔥   ⭐ THE DIFFERENT TEAMS ⭐ 🔥NLNLNL▶ Competitive team: 200+ wins K/D 1.8+ (Some exceptions) Good/Awesome 90's and edits.NLNL▶ Elite team: 100+ wins K/D 1.0 (Some exceptions) Decent 90's and edits.NLNL▶ Casual team: Any amount of wins and K/D all you have to do is tryout.NLNL▶ Editors: Be able to edit some good montages and clips together.NLNL▶ GFX Editors: Be able to make good thumbnails/pictures.NLNL                🔥 ⭐ DM <@378829085444407300>  IF YOU WANT
